name: DEFENDER Digital Wireless DVR Security System with 7" LCD and 2 Cameras

reviews.name: DEFENDER Digital Wireless DVR Security System with 7" LCD and 2 Cameras
reviews.reviewText:
This system is easy to use and install. I installed the whole system with 2 cameras in minutes, I attached the cameras to my stucco walls outside under my eaves. I just linked the cameras to the monitor, mounted and plugged them into the power (Done)! One camera watches the front door area and the other my driveway. All necessary mounting equipment came with the system.
The cameras transmit 30 & 40 feet to the monitor which sits next to my chair, they are clear and have decent color in the day. The night vision is very good for the money, it's better than my Q-see camera system which cost more.
The sound is the best! I'm listening to birds chirp right now and I enjoy being able to speak to someone outside, it really annoys my wife~ when she arrives the system alarm tells me and I welcome her home from either camera and my voice is clear through the system. Also, it's very intimidating to be talked to through a surveillance system when you approach someone's home.
(What I would change) The SD card needs to be removed to watch the videos` I would like to watch the on the monitor. It's a bit slow moving between cameras manually. Only one camera will record at a time, this is bad when the object being recorded moves between the cameras.
reviews.title: Good system for the price

reviews.name: DEFENDER Digital Wireless DVR Security System with 7" LCD and 2 Cameras
reviews.reviewText: The monitor was part of the seller for me. Clear picture & the cameras work great. I like the intercom feature, although I haven't used it often. Cant beat motion recording onto a sd card
reviews.title: The best Ive ever bought

reviews.name: DEFENDER Digital Wireless DVR Security System with 7" LCD and 2 Cameras

These Cameras being wireless is a great deal and ideal,the best part you can add cameras to it...

reviews.name: DEFENDER Digital Wireless DVR Security System with 7" LCD and 2 Cameras
reviews.reviewText: We already have 3 defenders...I bought this one as a wedding gift and hopefully when they move into their house next month...they will love theirs too!
reviews.title: Love talking to people outside!

reviews.name: DEFENDER Digital Wireless DVR Security System with 7" LCD and 2 Cameras
reviews.reviewText:
1. the software wouldn't load on my pc
excuses excuses no results just delays.
2. the power supply failed on one camera
they are 25$ for replacemants from r shack
so I didn't replace it. just as well too caus.
3. the screen /receiver failed and wont stop recording
and it wont turn off and over writes
all previus memory. the time froze and not any
of the functions work to control it. I am taking it back
to wall mart to get my 200+ dollars back.
reviews.title: failure totally
